2092360.name: Basureroes: Invasion Demo
2092360.description:
Basureroes: Invasion DEMO is the demo version of this 2D platform game with retro aesthetics, in which a group of heroes with different abilities must save the world from an alien invasion. Run, jump, and fight your way through twenty levels full of danger and epic boss fights.

Features:

  • Enjoy a special level selection.
  • Combat the invasion solo or in co-op mode (play remotely together!).
  • Experience a retro adventure reminiscent of 16-bit games!
2092360.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 巴斯克语, 加泰罗尼亚语, 加利西亚语, 德语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
